title: I got Pulsefire Ezreal in hextech chest. The icon doesn't show up, and the banner

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, and it looks like the icon was added with the skin crafting.  As DTN mentioned, you may need to scroll down and locate the icon.  Summoner Icons don't necessarily appear in the order they're obtained, so it could be in the middle of things.  Hope that helps!

Scrolling down your icon lists may move 3 rows at a time while displaying only 2. Try dragging the scroll bar instead of using your mouse scroll wheel to see if you were just skipping over rows. While the icon is equipped you'll have the banner in your profile.

If you still cannot find the icon, submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
